description: Ever-expansive thickets, foxtails, burrs, and everything else that sticks and threatens to rip has got nothing on the Jackson Ridge™ Pant. Durable cotton canvas is up to every campground challenge—from cutting wood to sitting on root-riddled dirt. With tapered legs and elastic cuffs, this utility style gets a tailored re-do for wearing outdoors and out and about. Lined insulating warmth to take the edge off the cold, add your favorite flannel to bring the heritage vibe home.
name: Mountain Hardwear Jackson Ridge Pants, Reg - Mens
